summary: Adds \'Bacon Skooma\' as a stand alone separate potion from ordinary Skooma
descriptionHtml:
A very simple mod that adds Bacon Skooma to Skyrim. Why? Well, because it\'s Bacon Skooma that\'s why! Need I say more? XD
It can be purchased from any of the three Khajiit caravans, as well as from the travelling Skooma dealers. Having the awesome taste of bacon, it increases 100 stamina.

---REQUIREMENTS---
None

---PROBLEMS/COMPATIBILITY ISSUES---
None known - if you find any please let me know

---INSTALL---
download with NMM or for manual install, simply download, unzip and drop folders into Skyrim/DATA directory

---UNINSTALL---
to uninstall manually, simply delete .esp file from skyrim/DATA directory and baconskooma.nif file from DATA/Meshes/clutter/food directory

===============================================================================
Constructive feedback and bug/issue reports are always welcome! Trolling IS NOT!
===============================================================================
author: Lordess
